Glossary: at-voc:accessibility Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Accessibility" (https://op.europa.eu/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/accessibility). at-voc:applicability Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Applicability" (https://op.europa.eu/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/applicability). at-voc:award-criterion-type Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Award criterion type" (https://op.europa.eu/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/award-criterion-type). at-voc:buyer-legal-type Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Buyer legal type" (https://op.europa.eu/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/buyer-legal-type). at-voc:communication-justification Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Communication justification" (https://op.europa.eu/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/communication-justification). at-voc:contract-nature Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Contract nature" (https://op.europa.eu/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/contract-nature). at-voc:country A country is one of the political units which the world is divided into, covering a particular area of land. Compulsory use of the code list from the ISO 3166-1 alpha-3. Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Country" (https://op.europa.eu/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/country). at-voc:cpv The CPV establishes a single classification system for public procurement aimed at standardising the references used by procuring entities to describe the purpose of procurement contracts and procurement projects. Compulsory use of Common Procurement Vocabulary (CPV) codes (Regulation (EC) No 213/2008) Source: Commision Regulation (EC) No 213/2008 (https://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/EN/TXT/?uri=CELEX:32008R0213) at-voc:direct-award-justification Justifications for the choice of the negotiated procedure without prior publication of a call for competition or concession. Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Direct Award Justification" (https://op.europa.eu/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/direct-award-justification). at-voc:dps-usage Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "DPS Usage" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/dps-usage). at-voc:economic-operator-size Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Economic Operator Size" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/economic-operator-size). at-voc:environmental-impact Requesting compliance with an ISO 14024 Type I environmental label Requesting compliance with the eco-management and audit scheme (EMAS), established by Regulation (EC) No 1221/2009 Requesting compliance with an ISO 14001 environmental management system, other than the eco-management and audit scheme (EMAS) established by Regulation (EC) No 1221/2009 Requesting compliance with the highest energy efficiency class (as defined by various legislation such as, for example, Regulation (EU) 626/2011 on air conditioners) Requesting, for the majority of the relevant purchase, the compliance with Regulation (EC) 834/2007 on organic production and labelling of organic products Other Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Environmental Impact" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/environmental-impact). at-voc:innovative-acquisition at-voc:language Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Language" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/language). at-voc:legal-basis Based on Legal Basis list defined by MDR. Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Legal Basis" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/legal-basis). at-voc:main-activity Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Main Activity" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/main-activity). at-voc:missing-info-submission Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Missing Information Submission" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/missing-info-submission). at-voc:modification-justification Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Modification Justification" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/modification-justification) at-voc:non-award-justification Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Non Award Justification" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/non-award-justification) at-voc:non-publication-justification Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Non Publication Justification" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/non-publication-justification) at-voc:number-fixed Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Number fixed" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/number-fixed) at-voc:number-threshold Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Number (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/number-weight) at-voc:nuts e.g. NUTS 2016 at-voc:other-place-service Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Other Place Service" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/other-place-service) at-voc:permission Statement by the Procuring Entity about whether it may apply modifications to the procurement procedure that would alter the overall nature of the contract or the framework agreement. (Pending to review by the WG) Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Permission" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/permission) at-voc:procurement-procedure-type It specifies the sort of procurement procedure, which will regulate the conditions and deadlines that apply to the process. Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Procurement Procedure Type" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/procurement-procedure-type) at-voc:requirement-stage at-voc:reserved-procurement Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Reserved Procurement" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/reserved-procurement) at-voc:selection-criterion Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Selection Criterion" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/selection-criterion) at-voc:social-objective Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Social Objective" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/social-objective) at-voc:strategic-procurement Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Strategic Procurement" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/strategic-procurement) at-voc:subcontracting-indication Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Subcontracting indication" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/subcontracting-indication) at-voc:subcontracting-obligation Codes and values used to show the obligation of the economic operator to subcontract parts of the original contract to third parties. WG Approval 17/09/2019 Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Subcontracting obligation" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/subcontracting-obligation) at-voc:timeperiod This code list is used by the Duration Measure attribute 'unitCode'. Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Timeperiods" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/timeperiods) at-voc:usage at-voc:winner-selection-status Source: EU Vocabularies authority table "Winner Selection Status" (https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/at-dataset/-/resource/dataset/winner-selection-status) epo:communication-type Indirect Direct epo:cpb-type cpb-acq Central purchasing body acquiring supplies and/or services intended for other buyers. cpb-awa Central purchasing body awarding public contracts or concluding framework agreements for works, supplies or services intended for other buyers. epo:design-contest-type OPEN RESTRICTED epo:eo-group-type CONSORTIUM Consortium JOINT_VENTURE Joint Venture UNDERTAKING Undertaking epo:evaluation-group-type REGULAR_BOARD JURY epo:exclusion-criterion epo:form-type plan Planning comp Competition dir-awa-pre Direct award preannouncement result Result cont-modif Contract modification change Change epo:framework-agreement fa-wo-rc Framework agreement, without reopening of competition fa-w-rc Framework agreement, with reopening of competition fa-mix Framework agreement, partly without reopening and partly with reopening of competition none None epo:legal-regime light-regime Set of principles and rules for social and specific services design-contest Set of principles and rules specific of design-contests standard Set of principles and rules for procedures in general epo:notice-corrigendum-justification cor-one-more Correction of one or more mistakes up-add-info Updated or additional information cor-pub-err Correction of a publication error ori-not-canc The original notice is cancelled buy-int-canc The buyer intends to cancel the original notice pub-info-post Publication of information which was originally postponed for reasons of law enforcement, commercial interests of an economic operator, fair competition or other public interest epo:notification-phases-content-types PLANNING.PIN COMPETITION.PIN COMPETITION.CN COMPETITION.QS DAP.VEAT RESULT.CAN CONTRACT.CM epo:procurement-regime-type SOCIAL_SPECIFIC_SERVICES Social an other specific services DESIGN_CONTEST Design contest epo:regulatory-framework-provider info-envir Organisation providing information concerning the general regulatory framework for environmental protection applicable in the place where the contract is to be performed. info-emp Organisation providing information concerning the general regulatory framework for employment protection and working conditions applicable in the place where the contract is to be performed. info-tax Organisation providing information concerning the general regulatory framework for taxes applicable in the place where the contract is to be performed. epo:security-clearance-address We cannot have direct properties pointing at descendant roles of the class Agent, because at the notification time many of them do not exist yet. ECONOMIC_OPERATOR CONTRACTOR TENDERER WINNER SUBCONTRACTOR epo:submission-document-type The period during which tenders submitted for this procurement procedure must remain valid. (Pending to review by the WG) TENDER Tender EOI Expression of Interest RFP Request for Participation RFC Request for Clarification epo:unit-code espd:eo-role-type oeron Other entity (relied upon) Version:1.0
